item.title: 1. That's Too Much Dinosaur
item.itunes:subtitle: A podcast is born!
item.itunes:author: Jeff Ruberg, Ashley McDonnell, and Ash Sofman
item.description: In the debut episode of Podigious, we discuss our goals for the podcast, and introduce ourselves by talking about our favorite aspects of Digimon. You can find the full show notes for this episode at http://podigious.com/1.
item.itunes:summary: In the debut episode of Podigious, we discuss our goals for the podcast, and introduce ourselves by talking about our favorite aspects of Digimon. You can find the full show notes for this episode at http://podigious.com/1.
item.content:encoded:
In the debut episode of Podigious, we discuss our goals for the podcast, and introduce ourselves by talking about our favorite aspects of Digimon.

You can find the full show notes for this episode at http://podigious.com/1.

Sections

  • 00:00: Intro
  • 07:45: Favorite Seasons
  • 19:17: Favorite Characters
  • 25:38: Favorite Villains
  • 30:25: Favorite Designs
  • 37:44: Outro

Spoilers

  • 26:40: Adventure 02 (6 seconds—until 26:46)
  • 26:46: Tamers (9 seconds—until 26:55)
  • 28:36: Adventure 02 (30 seconds—until 29:06)

Episodes Covered

Things Mentioned

  • 08:20: Digimon Virtual Pet
  • 08:27: Digimon Adventure
  • 08:39: Digimon Adventure 02
  • 08:54: Digimon Tamers
  • 09:15: Digimon Frontier
  • 09:41: Digimon Savers (Data Squad)
  • 10:04: Digimon Xros Wars (Fusion)
  • 14:24: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
  • 14:32: Mamoru Hosoda
  • 16:53: TxK
  • 27:19: Serial Experiments Lain
  • 27:27: Chiaki Konaka
  • 34:13: Digivolution Levels
  • 36:41: Dinosaurs
